review_text: Great course! It taught me a lot about local SEO and gave me a clear plan on what I need to fix on our website and google my business listing. Highly recommended.
Amazing course on local SEO. Very well structured and easy to grasp course.

Great course.

While I do use many of those tools in my everyday work, this will certainly expand my knowledge and allow me to be even better in what I do :)

Thank you :)
This was an excellent course and very informative. The teacher was extremely clear and provided practical and applicable knowledge. Thank you!
Learned a lot, thank you.

Course was detailed, well thought out and easy to follow.  I now can take the information and build out an SEO plan for my local business. Thank you again to the instructor for taking the time to put together relevant content.

Great course! a lot of specific informations.
Thanks for this good job.

Great course! Hits the major areas of local SEO in a way that any business owner can go ahead and implement. I wish there were a tool presented like Keywords Everywhere that's FREE! Also, I was a bit confused because I thought he said we'd explore Yoast SEO plugin in the meta tags section, but we never actually did later in the course... Maybe I misunderstood?
The videos are well made, but the contents are very basic.  Not worth the time and money
Was great until the technical SEO which seems almost a waste as I am using Shopify not WordPress. Maybe I’m missing something?

Dear Mr. Alastair Dunstan. Content of this course is awesome. Learned a lot. Thank you so much to you and for Fiverr.
good course

For a basic Local SEO course, this is very good. I'm a professional SEO but this still filled in a few gaps and I'm grateful for that. For a beginning SEO, this would be a valuable introduction to the topic. Not super in-depth but quality.

Alastair Dunstan touches on a problem which widely ignored by social media managers, SEO experts, and web designers: Local SEO. What should be emphasized more in this course is the fact that keyword patterns vary from country to country. In Germany, most of the people are keener on names and nouns and unfortunately not on verbs, adjectives, and gerunds as you can also observe reading German newspapers.
Very helpful and to the point!
This is an excellent course, full of information about the local SEO, instructor highlighted all the key elements of SEO. LOVED IT.

This is the most helpful, easy to understand course in SEO that I've ever taken. Everything is super helpful and practical, even for SEO beginners. I feel prepared to start work on local SEO right away. Even if you don't have a local business, it is helpful for understanding SEO in general.
Very easy to understand, step-by-step holistic approach to learning local SEO. Helps clear up any blind spots you may have about how every piece of the puzzle fits together and why!
Very very good course!

The course information was delivered in an easy to follow manner. It was not overly technical and didn't put me to sleep.  There were enough downloadable information to provide direction when working on my own site.  If you're looking for a good class on Local SEO, look no further!
Overall good course but it would be more great if you tells us about the google map local citations otherwise the course was fantastic highly recommended!

All in all very helpful. Time to implement.

Excellent course! Got me up to speed quickly after not doing SEO for years. Lots of great tips and instruction to get some quick wins as I slowly get our site back up in the rankings.

BEST SEO course I have taken on Fiverr so far. I highly suggested this course for local business or website owners, SEO specialists, or content creators/copywriters (such as myself) who are seeking to up their SEO game. I know quite a bit about SEO, but I still learned a lot from this course including some actionable tips and tricks for writing better, more SEO-optimized content for my clients. I can't say enough good things about this course! The presenter did a wonderful job and gave deep-dive demos that were very informative.
It filled all the gaps for me.

Well designed, and executed course.
Just wonderful!
Epic. Love the real life examples. I can’t wait to apply this to all our clients websites!

Thanks for the unique course and for teaching us so professionally. I learned a lot of new strategies with you. 

I also want to mention that only one thing that I felt is, that there wasn't any targeted video/lecture about Google Map Citation (that people make in a circle) for local businesses on Map :). Please make it available :)

Thanks again.
informative course!!!!
amazing and so informative
Covered all of the important elements of Local SEO, in a clear and concise manner. Offered good examples and provided relevant downloadable reference material.

I would need a handout to print prior to starting the chapters, including all chapters name and room to right information and relevant information mentioned in the video.

Also I didn't understand how to choose the right keywords in Keywords everywhere (lesson 6) and I was also not happy to have to buy USD 10 of keywords. 

My Mozbar on Google does not seem to work the same way as on the video. (lesson 8) and I did not understand how to choose the keywords from the competitor.

I got a wonderful experience starting to understand what SEO is about but I think you need to add more handouts with "how to" instructions to fully satisfy my needs. I will rewatch the entire lessons and look online for information that will help me fully understand how to implement the tools. Thank you very much!

It was great experience. A lot of techniques are discussed that helps to boast the ranking.

Moreover, practical implementation is somehow less which can be improved.

Highly Recommended!!!
Immensely valuable knowledge!
enjoyed learning about local SEO. I feel like I can use most of the info for my own pages.

Too much preamble
In a keyword search, a list of keywords appears to the right of the page.  How did you access that list?
I would suggest to stop asking for a review!! Its very annoying!
Great
Great course

Extremely informative and presented in an easily understandable fashion. I had virtually zero experience of SEO and have found this invaluable. If only I'd taken this course before employing someone to do the SEO on my site, I could have saved myself some money with at least equal, if not better results

Some of the suggested methods are grey area in the SEO practice on whether it helps. Geotagging images is one example. Also some suggested resources in the course are no longer free.

This course, however, is a good hand-holding beginner's guide to SEO on getting your journey started. It helped me straighten my new website out.

I still feel that I would need to engage with an SEO expert to fine-tune stuff, but at least I know I won't need to be paying someone to do the small tasks and I would now better understand the strategies behind them.
This is a great course! It was very simple and easy to follow through all the tutorials! I recommend this for anyone willing to do the hard work of SEO for their business.
Excellent! Good amount of info, well put & great explanations!

Amazing course on local SEO. Very well structured and easy to learn.

I think this course was ok but shorter and more simplistic than I expected with many parts being even too simplistic and not thoroughly explained enough.

Also, some of the SEO tools used for the examples are paid tools which wasn't clearly emphasized or mentioned. I think there could have been in general more information, more examples, explanation of the features of different SEO plugins, explanation in more detail of various SEO tools, etc.

I'm slightly more than a beginner and so the course didn't add much value. It's a good course if you are an absolute beginner, a small business owner with no clue about SEO at all.

The course provided practical, actionable insights that can be applied in real-world situations.

Overall, I would recommend this course to others looking to improve their skills in SEO
Good Local SEO Course
Loved it, thanks so much. Very easy to understand for someone who is just starting out.

Great course! Perfect for anyone wanting to know more about the interaction of social media, websites, and Google recognition. Beginner course offering not only manual procedure but also plug-in tactics to do each step. Also, don't forget that each of these tasks can also be found by a professional on Fiverr, but at least you will understand why it's necessary.

Basic information, more info on Youtube, google. Waster 2h of my life begging for one strong trick, info something. Best donation I've done so far on Fiver. When he mentioned about Moz being a ranking factor I almost left. Unreal how Fiver promoting this and it's full of 5 stars reviews. It's a very soft and nice summary of what Local seo is. On the positive side, liked the voice and tone, very solid for listening for a long time.
great course that teaches step by step
very clear, and interesting course.
